communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

title: Full Text of "Here to Stay Committee" Emails

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Copies of all emails that contain the following text in their subject lines:

“Mary Ellen Tamasy Conversation // IHDA Financing for "Here to Stay" Program”
“Here to Stay Initiative”
“Here to Stay Committee”
"Hear to Stay Committee"
"Next Steps for the Here to Stay Committee"
“Here to stay committee (second draft)”
“Discussion on Here to Stay Committee [City Council Agenda Items]”
“Hear (Here?) to Stay Committee”
“Here to Stay Committee meeting on 2/1”
“Evanston Here to Stay Committee”
“Here to Stay 4/18”
“Here to Stay (For Review Tonight)”

These emails were identified through metadata from a previous FOIA request (#24-3020). Please provide the full text of these emails, along with all associated metadata, headers, and attachments, regardless of the sender or recipient role (To, CC, or BCC).

Also:
In January of 2022 there was an email with the subject line: “Presentation shared with you: "Here to Stay"”
Please include the presentation file from that google link.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Niles Coalition
